configurable.i18n_description: The Slimmy Baltimore Grey is our slim, straight leg jean for men. Tailored to sit comfortably at the waist, the Slimmy is slim through the hip and thigh with a slightly tapered leg and a zip fly. Baltimore Grey is a dark, lightweight denim with a clean, straight-talking feel. Contrast stitching and red labelling add a dose of authenticity. A modern fit, a modern denim and a style that smartens up well.
configurable.i18n_description_es: The Slimmy Baltimore Grey is our slim, straight leg jean for men. Tailored to sit comfortably at the waist, the Slimmy is slim through the hip and thigh with a slightly tapered leg and a zip fly. Baltimore Grey is a dark, lightweight denim with a clean, straight-talking feel. Contrast stitching and red labelling add a dose of authenticity. A modern fit, a modern denim and a style that smartens up well.

configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit: The Slimmy is our slim straight leg jean. Tailored to sit comfortably at the waist, it fits slim through the hip and thigh with a slightly tapered leg and a zip fly. This fit comes in a variety of back pocket and stitching designs.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_de: Slimmy ist unsere schmale Straight Leg Jeans. Schmal geschnitten an Hüfte und Oberschenkeln, mit schmalerer Fussweite und Reissverschluss. Dieses Modell ist mit vielen verschiedenen Taschendesigns erhältlich.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_nl: De Slimmy is onze nauw aansluitende jeans met rechte pijp. De snit zit comfortabel aan de taille en sluit nauw aan ter hoogte van heup en dij met licht toelopende pijp en ritssluiting. Deze fit is beschikbaar met allerhande designs op de achterzakken en met verschillende stiksels.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_fr: Le Slimmy est un jean droit slim. Parfaitement coupé pour reposer confortablement sur la taille, il est slim au niveau des hanches et des cuisses, tandis que les jambes sont légèrement resserrées. Il est assorti d’une fermeture zippée. Cette coupe est proposée avec divers types de poches arrière et de surpiqûres.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_it: Slimmy è un jeans con taglio slim e gamba dritta. Particolarmente comodo in vita, ha una vestibilità aderente attorno a fianchi e cosce, con gamba leggermente affusolata e chiusura a zip. Disponibile con un’ampia varietà di tasche posteriori e cuciture.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_es: The Slimmy is our slim straight leg jean. Tailored to sit comfortably at the waist, it fits slim through the hip and thigh with a slightly tapered leg and a zip fly. This fit comes in a variety of back pocket and stitching designs.
